title: 2 BR 4143 N Greenview Ave
map_address: 4143 N Greenview Ave near Warner (between Clark and Ashland)
app_fee: $60 pp for background rept; move-in fee.  One year lease only.
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Large, lovely and convenient 1st floor apartment in prestigious Graceland West community of North Lakeview. Large living room with decorative fireplace; 2 large bedrooms. Lots of closet space. Updated kitchen with granite countertops opens to large dining/living space.  Hardwood floors throughout, heat included; A/C.  In-building laundry. Enclosed back porch for 3-season enjoyment. Cats OK (per pet policy); non-smoking building.  Broker owned/managed.  No security deposit; move-in fee.  One year (12-month) lease; $2,000 monthly rent.   Call (no texts) to schedule a showing 773-775-4460.
